basis: The user explicitly states non-commitment and keeps options optional, indicating only a low-probability action (may attempt 20 ml if remembered) rather than a firm commitment.
cognitive_dissonance: Tension between wanting to engage a tiny, non-pressuring hydration step and the fear of being pressured or judged due to anorexia; heat intensifies resistance.
negative_thought_patterns: Ambivalence, fear of demands, potential guilt about slipping, perfectionistic or all-or-nothing tendencies (wants to avoid judgment but anticipates it).
emotional_triggers: Heat, fatigue, resistance to structured plans, anxiety around eating patterns and self-judgment.
coaching_notes: Maintain a light, optional stance; acknowledge the heat and resistance; offer micro-actions only when remembered; avoid deadlines; reinforce self-advocacy and self-compassion; consider adding supportive prompts that emphasize self-care rather than dieting.
